texture - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooCharacter
 
Texture - Class in GlooKit.GlooAPI
Texture work in tandem with TextureAtlases and can mostly be thought of as a ByteBuffer of pixels Textures also know their width, height, and also possess a couple properties granted to them by their TextureAtlas This includes the coordinates of the upper left and lower right corners of this Texture in the TextureAtlas, as well as the handle of the Texture in the TextureAtlas
Texture(GlooApplication, int, String) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.Texture
Constructs a Texture by loading a .png file from a filepath
Texture(GlooApplication, int, ByteBuffer, int, int) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.Texture
Constructs a Texture by accepting a ByteBuffer, width, and height This is used primarily by GlooFontFamilies to load in GlooCharacters
Texture(GlooApplication, int, int) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.Texture
Constructs a Texture of width and height that is a purely white, full opacity image This is the Default Texture of the GlooCore The handle of this Texture is GlooCore.DEFAULT
texture - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Components.Rect
 
textureAtlas - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooFontFamily
 
TextureAtlas - Class in GlooKit.GlooAPI
A TextureAtlas is essentially a spritesheet.
TextureAtlas(GlooApplication) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.TextureAtlas
Overloader for constructing a TextureAtlas with the default textureUnit (GL13.GL_TEXTURE0)
TextureAtlas(GlooApplication, int) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.TextureAtlas
Constructor that constructs the "empty" TextureAtlas Includes the "null" texture, which is a 10x10 pixel white image
textures - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.TextureAtlas
 
textureUnit - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.TextureAtlas
